Topic.Title: Hiding the object list in a room by default

Posts.EditableText:
Hi

Is it possible to set the game so that it *doesn't* show the objects and exits in the room by default when the player enters?

I want the player to use commands/verbs to discover the contents of the room. 

I can't see an option to disable this. 

Olly
